member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Wpf.Export.VisioExporter
member.summary: Exports diagrams to Visio 2003 XML Drawing files (*.vdx).

Full path to the exported Visio .vdx file.

member.summary: Removing XML child node from VDX structure
